adviseScripts.text: Erm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Did something happen?
I slipped again during the test.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Ugh, I'm hopeless.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Cheer up, you'll do better next time.
Was the test really difficult?
I know you're just saying that to make me feel better,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: but thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I'll try harder next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Negative. I would categorize the test as exceedingly easy, perhaps overly so.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: T.A.L.O.S.!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Why would you say that?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I comfort Kilo, who is feeling down.
I've bounced around from squad to squad for so long,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: that it's been nearly impossible to build relationships with anyone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I think that's why I feel jealous when I see people form close connections with others.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: What are you talking about? You have something that you're close to.
Huh? Who?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: T.A.L.O.S.
Me.
That is correct.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: I will never abandon you, so do not fret.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: I guess you're right...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I mean, you're not technically what I'd call a partner, but still...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I... I guess you're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That makes me feel warm and fuzzy inside.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Er, no, I-I mean!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Commander...!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I meant something platonic, like a fellow squad member!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I discuss how we each define the term "partner".
Commander, in your eyes,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: what do you think I'm good at?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: If I'm even good at anything...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I'm not so sure myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You're good at piloting T.A.L.O.S.
Hmm... let me think about that for a moment.
Well yeah, that's a given.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: What kind of pilot would I be if I could not operate this system properly?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You are a skilled pilot, Kilo.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: That is something you can be proud of.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Oh jeez, all these compliments are kind of embarrassing...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I knew it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I guess you can't think of anything...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: It's fine. You don't have to force yourself to come up with something just to comfort me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I know what I am.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I have a serious conversation about what she's good at.
Um... Commander...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: How is it that you're so... popular?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I-I was just curious...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Because of my devilish good looks.
Because I care for the people I surround myself with.
I mean...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: No one can refute that, sure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You're super cool, and there's no denying that,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: but surely there must be other reasons, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I think you're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You're so kind and considerate all the time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I think that's why I'm so drawn to you, sometimes without even realizing it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I discuss other people who we think are popular.
Hello, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: T.A.L.O.S. is nowhere to be seen.
Where's your partner?
Looks like it'll be just you and me today. How intimate.
Partner?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Oh, you mean T.A.L.O.S.?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: It's in the shop for maintenance today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You don't feel awkward if it's just the two of us interacting, do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I-Intimate?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Er... Ah.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Oh boy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I-I'm kinda nervous all of a sudden... can't concentrate...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I have a short chat.
Hello, {AccountData.NickName}.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Is Kilo not with you?
She is currently sleeping in the cockpit.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Shall I wake her up?
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Yes, if you could.
No, I'll wait for her to wake up.
*Whooosh*
... Hmm? Oh, hi Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Sorry for sleeping in so late. I got to bed late yesterday since I was doing work.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: *Yawn* I still don't feel fully rested.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: A moment later.
*Pooshook*
*Yawn* When did I fall asleep... huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Commander?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: How long have you been standing there?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You should have woken me up!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: It's okay. If you're tired, it's important to get proper sleep.
I appreciate you being so understanding.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo tells me more about why she stayed up late last night.
An old colleague I used to work with was saying how she finds it annoying to address T.A.L.O.S. and me separately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: She even suggested collectively referring to us as Kilos to make it easier.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I don't know why, but that makes me feel kinda weird...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You are both your own individual people.
Kilos, huh? Has a nice ring to it.
Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You're the best, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That's exactly what I wanted to hear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Wha... you think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I wasn't saying there was anything inherently wrong with the name.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: It was more that I felt like my own individuality was being diminished...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: ... Excuse me?
... Never mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilos and I spend some time conjuring up more nicknames to refer to her and T.A.L.O.S.
Hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: What's up?
Ah, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Today's test results were pretty darn good!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Of course, luck played a big factor, but still.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, there are some days when luck just seems to be on your side.
Don't downplay your own contribution. Your skill is what did it, not luck.
Yeah...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I wish I could be so lucky all the time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: At least that would be more consistent than my own skill level, which is so erratic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: W-What? That can't be it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Someone like me doesn't have skills. Not like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: ... But still,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: it's nice to hear you say that. Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I talk more about the tests she's taking.
Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: what do you think is the most important trait a pilot should possess?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: A thorough understanding of the machine they're commandeering.
Objectivity and quick decision-making.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I guess that's one way to look at it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That's right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: If you find yourself hesitating at a critical moment,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: you're toast!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I continue to discuss what it takes to be an ace pilot.
Commander! Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: T.A.L.O.S. did something amazing today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: We ran a simulation that had only a 20% success rate,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: and T.A.L.O.S. passed with flying colors.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Wow, that's incredible.
Oh come on, are you pulling my leg?
Isn't it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I can't tell you how proud I was!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I'll never forget this!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Huh?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Of course not!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I would never lie about something like this!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo proceeds to gush about T.A.L.O.S. for a while.
Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: have you ever encountered a Pilgrim by any chance?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
Wow! I figured you would have. So cool!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: How was it meeting them in person?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: They're way stronger than ordinary Nikkes, aren't they?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I hope to be as impressive as they are one day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Oh, you've never met one?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I thought you would have.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Sorry for assuming.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Kilo about Pilgrims.
Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: do you prefer cloudy or clear weather?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Clear days.
Cloudy days.
Me too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: For some reason,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I always perform better when training is held on clear days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Plus you can see further out when the weather is clear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: If it's a cloudy day, I feel like my own mood becomes overcast.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Like I'm being drained of energy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: So I don't really like cloudy days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I converse about our favorite types of weather.
Whenever you're feeling down,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: what do you do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I just relinquish control and let it wash over me.
I think of the times I did well and try not to be too hard on myself.
Wash over you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You mean like detach yourself from your emotions?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That's... not always easy to do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Times when you did well...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Might I suggest recalling last week when you obtained a high score in the Simulation Room?
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Oh right. I did do that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Thanks, T.A.L.O.S.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I teach Kilo various other ways to overcome self-doubt.
I've found myself
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: wanting more and more to settle down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I want to have a regular work schedule for once, and steady colleagues.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That's been on my mind quite a lot.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Isn't that what you're doing now?
It will happen to you someday.
No...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I don't have any outstanding abilities
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: or talents.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That's why I can't settle down in one place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: You really think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Should I just keep my head down and work hard at it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: No matter how improbable it may seem, I know that a path will one day open itself to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: ... Thank you, Commander. I feel so much better, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I envision what Kilo's future will be like.
I wonder...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: If I were to have someone I worked with steadily,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: what kind of personality would mesh well with mine?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Someone sunny and positive.
Someone reliable and assertive.
You mean like someone who lightens the mood all the time?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I guess that would be nice,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: but if I were always around someone so bubbly,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: they might make me seem like a rain cloud, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Oh, that's a good idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That would make me have to be more assertive myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Plus I could ask them all sorts of stuff.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I think it'd make me feel really safe and reassured.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I make conjectures about her hypothetical future colleague.
Umm, I couldn't help but notice...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: the handle on your desk drawer seems to be broken.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I could replace it for you if you'd like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: How would you do that?
It's okay. Don't worry about it.
Ah!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I'd use the 3D printer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: It shouldn't take too long.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: In fact, it should be ready by the time we're done with this session.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Oh... okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I'm sorry if I overstepped any boundaries.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I just saw how the handle was dangling there...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I continue with our counseling session.
Commander, you're here early!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: How does T.A.L.O.S. look today?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: What do you mean?
Hmm... It seems shinier.
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Don't you notice anything different?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: No.
No way...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I've been spending so much time cleaning it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, that's right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I've spent the better half of the day
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: giving it a spit shine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I'm so glad you noticed!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I appreciate you doing this,
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Kilo.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Kilo fills me in on the details of how she cleaned up T.A.L.O.S.
I-I finally got some time off,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: but I don't know what I should do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: What about just resting?
Do whatever you want.
You mean... just do nothing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Actually, come to think of it, it's been ages since I last had a proper rest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That's not a bad idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for the suggestion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Hmm, what do I want to do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I'd like...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: to get a good score on the tests.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That's all I can think of.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I have a conversation about vacations.
Hello, {AccountData.NickName}.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Kilo is currently occupied.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: She will return momentarily, however.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: If we're going to wait, I might as well entertain myself.
T.A.L.O.S. is capable of all sorts of things, so let's see what it can do.
T.A.L.O.S., sing a song.
T.A.L.O.S., dance.
Which genre would you prefer?
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Anything, whatever you're good at.
Understood.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Butterfly♪, butterfly♪
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Come fly over here♪
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: To dance, I would require a larger surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: I do not recommend dancing in this location, as doing so could cause damage to the Commander's Room.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: Okay... then how about singing?
Understood.
adviseScripts.speaker: T.A.L.O.S.

adviseScripts.text: The sound of T.A.L.O.S. singing a children's lullaby fills the room.
*Zing*
Sorry that I'm late...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Huh? What's going on here?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Kilo and I proceed to listen to T.A.L.O.S. sing.
If I want to be liked by someone that I've only met recently,
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: how should I act?
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: The most important thing is confidence. Conduct yourself as if that person is already a long-time friend.
Be careful not to act too impetuously, so as not to arouse suspicion.
Oh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I've never had a close friend...
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: so I don't really know what that feels like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: Oh, okay!
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: That is exactly what I do anyway.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: As long as the other person doesn't think poorly of me or think I'm strange, that's good enough for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad that I'm on the right track.
adviseScripts.speaker: Kilo

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Kilo about how to be liked by someone.
